[[File:Stye.jpg|vignette|532x532px|Lower eyelid stye]]

question.question: Which of the following is the most accurate description of a stye?
question.option_a: A stye is a type of cancerous growth on the eyelid.
question.option_b: A stye is a viral infection that affects the cornea.
question.option_c: A stye is a bacterial infection of the sebaceous glands of the eyelid.
question.option_d: A stye is a chronic condition caused by allergies.
